job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description:
About Ruggable:
Ruggable is a Los Angeles-based, venture-backed, rapidly growing e-commerce startup that is disrupting the $7B rug industry and revolutionizing the market for residential rugs. Our patented 2-Piece Rug System allows you to remove the top layer of your rug and wash it in your home washing machine, offering an affordable, stylish and convenient solution for young families, pet owners, and busy individuals. We're a small, entrepreneurial team with big ambitions. We have a strong brand, established traction, and amazing advisors fueling our steady growth. This is an opportunity to get in at the ground floor and solve for complex challenges, while charting your own career.
Job Summary:
As a Software Engineer I at Ruggable, you will be responsible for building new site features and enhancements of existing functionality to improve the customer experience. You will work collaboratively with other software engineers, product managers and designers in an agile environment, which includes code reviews, test automation, daily standups, and whiteboarding sessions. You will also help troubleshoot errors, fix usability issues, and ensure website reliability.
What You'll Do:
Partner with our Product Managers & Designers to translate mocks into fully functioning pages
Build out captivating user experiences that delight our visitors
Create and launch promotional campaigns across the entire site
Implement A/B tests to optimize conversion rates
Help evolve our existing platform to better serve our growing customer base as we expand internationally
What You'll Need to Have:
Required:
1-3 years experience in software engineering
Experience with React, JavaScript, Liquid, HTML and CSS
Ability to problem-solve collaboratively with team members
Ability to manage code via Git
Strong critical thinking skills
Preferred:
Knowledge of REST and GraphQL APIs
Developed applications on a team (e.g., code review, test automation)
Experience with eCommerce (Shopify preferred)
Ability to work with minimal direction
Eagerness to learn new technologies, tools or skills
Based in Los Angeles (open to remote)
At Ruggable, we offer competitive compensation and benefits packages. Ruggable is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. We proudly recruit and hire a diverse workforce and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
